title: Middlekauff – 3 and Out - Over for McCarthy despite MNF win, Brady/Mahomes SNF shootout takeaways, Chargers underrated contenders; CFB Playoff picture
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 and Out - Over for McCarthy despite MNF win, Brady/Mahomes SNF shootout takeaways, Chargers underrated contenders; CFB Playoff picture
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 3 and Out with John Middlekauff is part of the Colin Cowherd Podcast Network. 3 and Out is an unfiltered podcast covering the biggest stories in the NFL and college football. John brings his unique perspective as a former NFL scout, NFL analyst and radio host. In this episode, John explains why it's over for Mike McCarthy in Green Bay despite the Packers MNF win, and why the Chargers are an under the radar title contender. He also gives his takeaways from Brady and Mahomes SNF shootout, looks at the College Football Playoff picture, and answers listener questions from the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
